p: Usually lamb meat has a high SFA content and low PUFA/SFA values. Increasing the PUFA concentration in the ration, by including a source rich in either n-6 or n-3 PUFA generally improves the PUFA/SFA ratio. This was also observed in the present study, and in oil diets, the PUFA/SFA ratio was lower than 0.45, so as recommended by the WHO/FAO [ 4].
